name: 'Resistant To Charms'
value: 'You’re aware of how others can manipulate and charm people
column4: and you notice when those tactics are used on you. Because of this awareness
column5: you are trained in resisting any kind of persuasion or seduction if you wish it'

name: 'Generous'
value: 'Allies who have spent the last day with you add +1 to their recovery rolls.'

name: 'Altruistic'
value: 'If you’re standing next to a creature that takes damage
column4: you can intercede and take 1 point of that damage yourself (reducing the damage inflicted on the creature by 1 point). If you have Armor
column5: it does not provide a benefit when you use this ability.'

name: 'Beneficient Skill'
value: 'You’re trained in all tasks related to pleasant social interaction

name: 'Helpful'
column4: that character gains the benefit as if you were trained even if you are not trained or specialized in the attempted task.'

name: 'Beneficient inability'
column4: all Intellect and Speed tasks are hindered.'
